name: Food Crash!
description:
GO TO FULL SCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

MADE BY LUCIAN MOSEMAK & ANTHONY JIMENEZ

INTRO:

This game is meant to teach teens what macronutrients are HEALTHY/GOOD and what is considered UNHEALTHY/BAD

This is supportive for any devices with a keyboard and or touchscreen as well as any device with a mouse.

Thank you (my ENG teacher) for incouraging me to make this game for my IDT project.

In this game you play as a "blood" ship and you have to shoot all of the SIMPLE CARBS like fructose while collecting the PROTEINS, FATS, and COMPLEX CARBS like fibers and such.

You space ship shoots INSULIN and you gain 1 pt for shooting fructose and 4 pts for collecting proteins, fats, and complex carbs. When shooting fructose, it explodes into proteins fats and complex carbs so get shooting!

Make sure to AVOID getting hit by fructose because it damages your ship.

CONTROLS:

W-S: move forward/ backward

A-D: turn left/right

LEFT CLICK/TAP ON SCREEN: shoot insulin

ESC:  quit game
